name: Tales of the Underground Kingdom
description:
Tales of the Underground Kingdom - Episode 1

Become our intrepid hero and have the adventure of a lifetime in Tales of the Underground Kingdom!

A point-and-click adventure game made for the 20th libGDX game jam .
Theme : Underground
libGDX Jam 20 - itch.io

Music:
"Magic Stout" - "Take a Change" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
